segment.source: Network access Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously (Windows 10)
segment.target: Network access Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously (Windows 10)

segment.source: Describes the best practices, location, values, policy management and security considerations for the Network access Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously security policy setting.
segment.target: Describes the best practices, location, values, policy management and security considerations for the Network access Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously security policy setting.

segment.source: Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously
segment.target: Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously

segment.source: Describes the best practices, location, values, policy management and security considerations for the Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously security policy setting.
segment.target: Describes the best practices, location, values, policy management and security considerations for the Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously security policy setting.

segment.source: This policy setting determines which communication sessions, or pipes, have attributes and permissions that allow anonymous access.
segment.target: This policy setting determines which communication sessions, or pipes, have attributes and permissions that allow anonymous access.

segment.source: Restricting access over named pipes such as COMNAP and LOCATOR helps prevent unauthorized access to the network.
segment.target: Restricting access over named pipes such as COMNAP and LOCATOR helps prevent unauthorized access to the network.

segment.source: Set this policy to a null value; that is, enable the policy setting, but do not enter named pipes in the text box.
segment.target: Set this policy to a null value; that is, enable the policy setting, but do not enter named pipes in the text box.

segment.source: This will disable null session access over named pipes, and applications that rely on this feature or on unauthenticated access to named pipes will no longer function.
segment.target: This will disable null session access over named pipes, and applications that rely on this feature or on unauthenticated access to named pipes will no longer function.

segment.source: Computer ConfigurationWindows SettingsSecurity SettingsLocal PoliciesSecurity Options
segment.target: Computer ConfigurationWindows SettingsSecurity SettingsLocal PoliciesSecurity Options

segment.source: The following table lists the actual and effective default values for this policy.
segment.target: The following table lists the actual and effective default values for this policy.

segment.source: Default values are also listed on the policy’s property page.
segment.target: Default values are also listed on the policy’s property page.

segment.source: This section describes different features and tools available to help you manage this policy.
segment.target: This section describes different features and tools available to help you manage this policy.

segment.source: Changes to this policy become effective without a device restart when they are saved locally or distributed through Group Policy.
segment.target: Changes to this policy become effective without a device restart when they are saved locally or distributed through Group Policy.

segment.source: For this policy setting to take effect, you must also enable the Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares setting.
segment.target: For this policy setting to take effect, you must also enable the Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares setting.

segment.source: This section describes how an attacker might exploit a feature or its configuration, how to implement the countermeasure, and the possible negative consequences of countermeasure implementation.
segment.target: This section describes how an attacker might exploit a feature or its configuration, how to implement the countermeasure, and the possible negative consequences of countermeasure implementation.

segment.source: You can restrict access over named pipes such as COMNAP and LOCATOR to help prevent unauthorized access to the network.
segment.target: You can restrict access over named pipes such as COMNAP and LOCATOR to help prevent unauthorized access to the network.

segment.source: The following list describes available named pipes and their purpose.
segment.target: The following list describes available named pipes and their purpose.

segment.source: These pipes were granted anonymous access in earlier versions of Windows and some legacy applications may still use them.
segment.target: These pipes were granted anonymous access in earlier versions of Windows and some legacy applications may still use them.

segment.source: Systems network Architecture (SNA) is a collection of network protocols that were originally developed for IBM mainframe computers.
segment.target: Systems network Architecture (SNA) is a collection of network protocols that were originally developed for IBM mainframe computers.

segment.source: Default named pipe for SQL Server.
segment.target: Default named pipe for SQL Server.

segment.source: Named pipe for the Print Spooler service.
segment.target: Named pipe for the Print Spooler service.

segment.source: Remote Procedure Call Locator service named pipe.
segment.target: Remote Procedure Call Locator service named pipe.

segment.source: Distributed Link Tracking Client named pipe.
segment.target: Distributed Link Tracking Client named pipe.

segment.source: Distributed Link Tracking Server named pipe.
segment.target: Distributed Link Tracking Server named pipe.

segment.source: Configure the Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously setting to a null value (enable the setting but do not specify named pipes in the text box).
segment.target: Configure the Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously setting to a null value (enable the setting but do not specify named pipes in the text box).

segment.source: This configuration disables null-session access over named pipes, and applications that rely on this feature or on unauthenticated access to named pipes no longer function.
segment.target: This configuration disables null-session access over named pipes, and applications that rely on this feature or on unauthenticated access to named pipes no longer function.

segment.source: This may break trust between Windows Server 2003 domains in a mixed mode environment.
segment.target: This may break trust between Windows Server 2003 domains in a mixed mode environment.
